title: Strategy-Based Tool Utilization for Improving Advanced English Writing Paraphrasing Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English writing skills and experience in academic writing
context.additional_context: A customized course for adult learners aiming to strengthen English academic writing skills in higher education settings

learning_goals: Learners can perform paraphrasing at over 80% lexical/syntactic accuracy while preserving the core meaning of given texts
Learners can appropriately select and utilize three digital tools (Microsoft Word synonym dictionary, Thesaurus.com, Linggle) based on contextual needs
Learners can reduce plagiarism risks in source texts by 90% through sentence restructuring (sentence conversion, conjunction modification) and lexical substitution strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
